Title: Relates to project labor agreement feasibility studies and apprenticeship agreements
Summary: Relates to project labor agreement feasibility studies and apprenticeship agreements; the study shall look to see if there will be a negative impact on opportunities for minority, women or service-disabled veteran owned businesses; such feasibility studies shall be provided to the public for review and comment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to project labor agreement feasibility studies and apprenticeship agreements
